svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Index of democracy: participation and competition
The Index of Democracy is the product of combining data on political participation and electoral competition.
Specifically: Index = [(% of the adult population who voted in the elections) * (1 - % of the winning party's votes in a
